architectural_notes: Backend runs on an Internet Computer canister; if the canister is stopped, requests are rejected (IC0508) and role provisioning/API calls fail until redeployed/restarted.
known_issues: Backend canister (xwevn-xyaaa-aaaai-at4jq-cai) is stopped, causing IC0508 reject code 5 errors and blocking role provisioning; DebugPanel shows Backend Actor: Not Ready.
Project files fail to load due to backend outage; client sees JSON parse error: Unexpected token '<' (HTML returned instead of JSON).

existing_features.title: Trigger a fresh deployment (to restart backend canister xwevn-xyaaa-aaaai-at4jq-cai) by updating the contents of the deployment retry marker file at frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt (e.g., change the ISO timestamp on line 1) without changing application functionality.

projectName: Restart stopped backend by forcing a deployment retry
